hotels.name: Hotel Park
hotels.desc: Iconic lakeside hotel, elegant rooms, direct beach access, spa facilities
hotels.longDesc: Slovenia's most famous hotel sits right on Lake Bled's shore, offering families easy access to water activities and stunning alpine views from their rooms.

hotels.name: Pristava Lepena
hotels.desc: Boutique glamping resort, riverside setting, eco-friendly design, adventure activities
hotels.longDesc: Unique riverside glamping experience along the Soƒça River with cozy tents and adventure tours perfect for families seeking nature immersion without sacrificing comfort.

hotels.name: Grand Plaza Hotel & Congress Center, Ljubljana
hotels.desc: Central city hotel, modern amenities, family rooms, near green spaces
hotels.longDesc: Modern Ljubljana hotel in the heart of the capital with spacious family rooms and easy walking distance to parks, museums, and local attractions.
hotels.photoAttribution: Grand Plaza Hotel & Congress Center, Ljubljana

hotels.name: Camping Polovnik
hotels.desc: Family-friendly campground, river location, playgrounds, rental accommodations
hotels.longDesc: Welcoming riverside campground with cabin rentals, playgrounds, and organized activities ideal for families wanting affordable accommodation with outdoor recreation.

restaurants.longDesc: Charming countryside restaurant in Slovenia's honey capital serving authentic local dishes in a warm, family-welcoming setting surrounded by beehives.

restaurants.longDesc: Beloved neighborhood restaurant serving generous portions of traditional Slovenian comfort food in a cozy, nostalgic setting popular with locals and families.

restaurants.name: Pre≈°ernov trg

restaurants.longDesc: Elegant historic cafe overlooking Ljubljana's main square, perfect for families to enjoy Slovenian pastries, quality coffee, and vibrant street-watching.

experiences.name: Lake Jasna
experiences.desc: Crystal-clear alpine waters surrounded by majestic peaks
experiences.longDesc: Crystal-clear alpine waters reflect the surrounding majestic mountain peaks, creating a pristine and breathtakingly beautiful natural landscape.

experiences.name: Postojna Cave
experiences.desc: Massive underground cavern, train ride through cave, stalactites and stalagmites
experiences.longDesc: Slovenia's most spectacular cave system featuring a thrilling train ride through illuminated chambers filled with dramatic limestone formations that captivate children.

experiences.name: Predjama Castle
experiences.desc: Cliff-side medieval castle, dramatic location, secret tunnel network, museum
experiences.longDesc: Jaw-dropping fortress built into a cliff face near Postojna, offering families medieval history, tunnel exploration, and breathtaking photo opportunities.

experiences.name: Narodni muzej Slovenije
experiences.desc: Comprehensive history museum, interactive exhibits, Slovenian cultural heritage
experiences.longDesc: Ljubljana's premier museum presenting Slovenia's history through engaging exhibits that help families understand the nation's cultural identity and artistic achievements.

experiences.name: Aqua tours Bovec - Rafting, Canyoning and Kayaking
experiences.desc: Emerald river adventure, guided kayak tours, turquoise water, scenic gorge
experiences.longDesc: Experience Slovenia's most famous river through guided kayaking adventures down emerald-colored gorges, suitable for families and offering unforgettable alpine water views.

experiences.name: Fr√∂ccs Terrace Bovec
experiences.desc: Pack a picnic from local shops and enjoy riverside relaxation

experiences.name: Nature's Ways Bovec - Rafting & Canyoning
experiences.desc: Gentle family-friendly trails with stunning mountain views and wildflowers

experiences.name: Castle Bathing Area
experiences.desc: Historic public swimming area on Lake Bled with direct lake access, lawns, and views of Bled Castle

experiences.name: PLETNA BOAT CRUISE TO THE ISLAND BLED
experiences.desc: Traditional wooden boat ride to the island church with 99 steps and wishing bell
experiences.photoAttribution: PLETNA BOAT CRUISE TO THE ISLAND BLED

experiences.name: Kobarid Museum
experiences.desc: WWI museum with multimedia exhibits about the Isonzo Front

experiences.name: Great Soƒça Gorge
experiences.desc: Easy family-friendly trail along turquoise gorge with wooden walkways

kidFriendly.name: Ljubljana Zoo
kidFriendly.desc: Family zoo with diverse animals, playgrounds, park setting, educational programs
kidFriendly.longDesc: Well-maintained zoo in Tivoli Park featuring animals from around the world, interactive feeding experiences, and playgrounds that delight young travelers.

markets.name: Central Market
markets.desc: Historic farmers market, fresh produce, local crafts, riverside location
markets.longDesc: Vibrant central market bustling with local vendors selling fresh produce, artisan goods, and traditional foods, offering families authentic Slovenian food culture.

a.name: Slovenia's Lakes & Valleys (8 Days)
a.description: Alpine meadows, emerald rivers, and fairytale castles‚Äîa magical Slovenian adventure perfectly paced for families with young children.
